MoviesList.title: RRR
MoviesList.cast: NTR Jr., Ram Charan, Ajay Devgn
MoviesList.overview: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

MoviesList.title: BRO
MoviesList.cast: Pawan Kalyan, Sai Dharam Tej, Ketika Sharma
MoviesList.overview: An overworked man who often fails to focus on his loved ones is given a chance to turn his life around when he meets Titan, the god of time.

MoviesList.title: Ee Nagaraniki Emaindi
MoviesList.cast: Vishwaksen Naidu, Sushanth Reddy, Abhinav Gomatam
MoviesList.overview: In Goa and in desperate need of cash, four childhood friends get another shot at making their long-abandoned dreams of becoming filmmakers come true.

MoviesList.title: Major
MoviesList.cast: Adivi Sesh, Prakash Raj, Sobhita Dhulipala
MoviesList.overview: This biopic follows the life of Indian Army officer Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, from his childhood to his heroic actions during the 2008 Mumbai attacks.

MoviesList.title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
MoviesList.overview: After growing up enduring criticism from his father, a young man finds his world shaken upon learning he was switched at birth with a millionaire’s son.

MoviesList.title: Kantara
MoviesList.cast: Rishab Shetty, Kishore Kumar G., Achyuth Kumar
MoviesList.overview: A fiery young man clashes with an unflinching forest officer in a south Indian village where spirituality, fate and folklore rule the lands.

MoviesList.title: DON
MoviesList.overview: Seeking a sense of purpose, a wayward college student navigates life on campus while enduring a controlling father and a disciplinarian professor.

MoviesList.title: Mersal
MoviesList.overview: A detective arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.

MoviesList.title: Thunivu
MoviesList.overview: A major bank heist takes an unnerving turn when a mysterious interloper known only as Dark Devil begins to hijack the operation.

MoviesList.title: Most Eligible Bachelor
MoviesList.overview: Harsha is a smart, successful expat ready to marry whomever his parents choose... until he falls for a candid stand-up comedian they don’t approve of.
